DOC.brief_summary: In present trial , investigator aim evaluate whether semen myo-inositol ( MI ) treatment able improve IVF outcome . In particular , retrieved oocyte randomly divide two group , one group inseminate MI treat semen inseminate untreated semen .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Myoinositol Treatment Spermatozoa Vitro Fertilization Outcome : Prospective , Randomized Sibling-oocyte Study
DOC.detailed_description: Myo synthesize glucose-6-phosphate , precursor second messenger cell signal pathway involve regulation intracellular calcium . Literature data demonstrate MI play crucial role reproduction , indeed , oocyte spematozoa nursed medium conga hig MI concentration . Furthermore , demonstrate , oligoasthenoteratozoospermic patient , vitro incubation 2 mg/ml myo increase significantly number spermatozoa high mitochondrial membrane potential ( MMP ) . Moreover , find vitro fertilization rate correlate percentage high MMP spermatozoon .
